Action.author: kit
Action.body: I have similar error, but I +don’t have+ shim vendored. So, I just cannot instantiate chaincode at all. Nothing helps. Don’t know what to do. Using 1.0.5 and 1.0.6 containers.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: This is not a valid scenario .... you cannot deploy v1.1 chaincode on a v1.0 peer
